#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <cstring>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int to[105];
int n;
int v[105][105];
int vis[105];
int from[105];

bool flow(int pos)
{
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if(!vis[i] && v[pos][i]) {
                vis[i] = 1;
                if(to[i] == -1 || flow(to[i])) {
                    to[i] = pos;
                    from[pos] = i;
                    return true;
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
}

int main()
{
    //int n;
    map<string, int>  m;
    cin >> n;
    string s;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cin >> s;
    }
    memset(to, -1, sizeof(to));
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cin >> s;
        m[s] = i;
    }
    int val;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cin >> val;
        for(int j = 0; j < val; j++) {
            cin >> s;
            v[i][m[s]] = 1;
        }
    }
    int ans = 0;
    memset(from, -1, sizeof(from));
    bool flow_possible = true;
    while(flow_possible) {
        flow_possible = false;
        memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis));
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if(from[i] == -1) {
                flow_possible |= flow(i);
            }
        }
    }

    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if(from[i] != -1) ans++;
    }
    if(ans == n) {
        cout << "Yes\n";
    }
    else {
        cout << "No\n";
    }
}
